text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 105.1. Kia tu nay na dekha kay tery rab nay hathi walon kay sath kia kiya? 105.2. Kia unkay maker ko beykar nai kerdia? 105.3. Aur unper parindon kay jhond kay jhond bhej diey 105.4. Jo unhein mitti or pather ki kankariyan mar rahy thy
